quote: It doesn't matter what you do, only how well you do it.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Have the fearless attitude of a hero and the loving heart of a child.
author: Soyen Shaku

quote: Seek not the good in external things;seek it in yourselves.
author: Epictetus

quote: Life is essentially an endless series of problems. The solution to one problem is merely the creation of another.
author: Mark Manson

quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The human mind defines things in relation to one another - without light the notion of darkness would be unintelligible.
author: Josh Waitzkin

quote: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Storms don't last forever.
author: Unknown

quote: It is secondary whether we choose belief or defiance. What is precious is that we are always able to choose.
author: Ming-Dao Deng

quote: Nothing that results in human progress is achieved with unanimous consent.
author: Christopher Columbus

quote: Your spirit is the true shield.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: A man is but a product of his thoughts. What he thinks he becomes.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You can, you should, and if you're brave enough to start, you will.
author: Stephen King

quote: Money poisons you when you've got it, and starves you when you haven't.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Those who are enlightened never stop forging themselves.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Leadership starts at the top.
author: Morgan Wootten

quote: Fear does not have any special power unless you empower it by submitting to it.
author: Les Brown

quote: Study logic and math, because once you've mastered them, you won't fear any book.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: The cost of leadership is self-interest.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: The wise accomplish all that they want without arousing the envy or scorn of others.
author: Ming-Dao Deng

quote: It's possible in ways both large or small to make a difference in someone's life.
author: Yanni

quote: The birth of the mind is the death of the senses.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Realistic people do not accomplish extraordinary things.
author: John Eliot

quote: Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Inner peace is when you realize that, in the end, nothing matters.
author: Maxime Lagace

quote: The goal of an artist is to create the definitive work that cannot be surpassed.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Each day your life grows a day shorter. Make every move count.
author: Ming-Dao Deng

quote: The man who moved the mountain was the one who began carrying away the smallest stones.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Your goals are the road maps that guide you and show you what is possible for your life.
author: Les Brown

quote: If you are far from the enemy, make him believe you are near.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: There is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: A clear conscience is the sure sign of a bad memory.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Stop comparing yourself to others and focus on your own improvement.
author: Lolly Daskal

quote: Best be yourself, imperial, plain, and true.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Natural talent only determines the limits of your athletic potential. It's dedication and a willingness to discipline your life that makes you great.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Anything you may hold firmly in your imagination can be yours.
author: William James

quote: Peace is not something you wish for; It's something you make, something you do, something you are, and something you give away.
author: John Lennon

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: I am not absentminded. It is the presence of mind that makes me unaware of everything else.
author: Gilbert Chesterton

quote: Inspire yourself to be great. Being good isn't good enough.
author: Gurbaksh Chahal

quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The world is changed by your example, not by your opinion.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Misfortune shows those who are not really friends.
author: Aristotle

quote: There is nothing like looking if you want to find something.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: A liar knows that he is a liar, but one who speaks mere portions of truth in order to deceive is a craftsman of destruction.
author: Criss Jami

quote: A scientific man ought to have no wishes, no affections, - a mere heart of stone.
author: Charles Darwin
